attributes.action: stop the televising of the Thomas Cook ad sexualising under aged girls
attributes.additional_details: we have complained to the ASA but have met with a negative response telling us this is ok to televise. We strongly disagree
attributes.background: the song ' I'm the man your mumma warned me about', the clothing and posturing are inappropriate and offensive to anyone who cares about the safety of children.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the Advertising Standards Authority (ASA), which is independent of the Government and Parliament.
